availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bennett Robertson (Hart County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier in 33rd and 26th KY)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel Robertson and Jane Robertson. Resident in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Hart County in 1860. Served in Company C 33rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a Private from September 13, 1862 to February 5, 1864. Served in Company I 26th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a Private and was discharged March 18, 1864.

ab.bibl:

Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 381.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 405.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 226-6, 233.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Kentucky, Application #777190, Certificate #578926.
